top10_tweets_like: Today’s my first day working my dream job @rstudio! Can’t wait to help more people create beautiful and professional web applications with #rstats. https://t.co/xg4ujVC31V

Very excited that applications for rstudio::global() diversity scholarships are now open: https://t.co/zaafvqWiwa. We're sad that we won't be able to meet our diversity scholars in person, but excited to make them available to the whole world 🌍🌎🌏 #rstats

Yall! {stacks} is now on CRAN!🎉 

{stacks} is an #rstats package for tidymodels-aligned model stacking. Read more: https://t.co/h3PPAPLkC4

Day 30 - A map of the #30DayMapChallenge 
I wanted to finish the challenge in a colorful note with a map of fabric used in Africa using {ggpattern}. I want to thank @tjukanov, the #rstats community and particularly @jakub_nowosad
for centralizing all #rspatial submissions. https://t.co/AMxpvw9rsV

Hi Everyone. I'm teaching an #rstats course next quarter. 

One assignment is to have each student write about a #tidyverse function. What it's for and an example.

What are some less known #tidyverse functions that do a job you find useful?

‼️New version of #rayshader released with 3D polygon support! Add 3D extruded polygons with the `render_polygons()` function simply by passing in an {sf} object. Map a variable to height or use a constant value.

Ex: An exaggerated view of Seattle's skyline.

#rstats #rayrender https://t.co/sPyTuDoDVT

Learn more about the #tidymodels {stacks} package.
Model stacking is an ensembling technique that combines the outputs of many models to generate a new model—referred to as an ensemble in this package—that generates predictions informed by each of its members
#datascience #rstats https://t.co/bgdh3m1NNC https://t.co/lDeF197lM1

Vídeo sobre quantis.

Agradeço se puderem divulgar.

https://t.co/hl6RalD7LK
